706047f-a.folder: New York Avenue & Pacific Street, Brooklyn, NY
706047f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: New York Avenue - Pacific Street
706047f-a.text:
New York Avenue, east side, north from Pacific Street. On Atlantic Avenue is the elevated structure of the Long Island Railroad, and beyond that is Public School No. 93.
September 12, 1940
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The residence at the N. E. corner of New York Avenue and Pacific
Street, partially seen in view 1.
September 13, 1940
P. L. Sperr

706048f-a.folder: New York Avenue & Pacific Street, Brooklyn, NY
706048f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: New York Avenue - Pacific Street
706048f-a.text:
New York Avenue, east side, south from Pacific to Bergen Streets, showing a group of brownstone houses in the immediate foreground, and Public School No. 41, where the automobile is parked. Past that is the New York Avenue Methodist Episcopal
Church.
View 2 shows the brownstone houses.
P. L. Sperr  September, 1940
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2
